title: 179. Amie Kaufman & Jay Kristoff: Aurora Burning with Nicole Hayes
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Best selling co-authors Amie Kaufman and Jay Kristoff chat about Aurora Burning, their collaborative writing process and why they write. Together they have written more than a million words as a duo! This is a brilliant episode with podcaster Dani Vee and guest co-host, author and podcaster of The Outer Sanctum Nicole Hayes.
itunes:subtitle: Best selling co-authors Amie Kaufman and Jay Krisâ€¦
description: Best selling co-authors Amie Kaufman and Jay Kristoff chat about Aurora Burning, their collaborative writing process and why they write. Together they have written more than a million words as a duo! This is a brilliant episode with podcaster Dani Vee and guest co-host, author and podcaster of The Outer Sanctum Nicole Hayes.
